description:
Staff ML Engineer   

United States (LA HQ - role is fully remote US)

$180,000 - $250,000 + 20% bonus + equity.

Are you interested in working at the forefront of the tech space, with one of the biggest tech companies in the world?

A global tech giant is looking to expand their team by bringing in a Mid-Level ML Engineer (2-3 years) and a Senior ML Engineer (5+ years).

Role:

We are seeking a highly skilled Staff ML/Computer Vision Engineer to join our US team. This role will be focused on developing advanced AI tooling for solving pieces of the asset generation problem for video games. The successful candidate will play a key role in solving complex problems related to map generation, light interaction modeling, texture generation, and more. This is an exciting opportunity to be part of a new project within a rapidly growing company and have a significant impact on the product roadmap.

Responsibilities:

Lead research and development efforts for solving pieces of the asset generation problem for video games.

Develop and implement advanced AI algorithms and models to generate maps, textures, and other assets for video games.

Drive the development and implementation of cutting-edge computer vision algorithms and techniques.

Conduct experiments and evaluations to validate the effectiveness of AI algorithms and models.

Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior team members.

Contribute to the product roadmap by identifying areas for innovation and improvement.

Requirements:

Master's or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or related field with a focus on computer vision.

Proven experience in AI research and development, particularly in machine learning and deep learning.

Strong programming skills in languages such as Python, C++, or Java.

Extensive experience in computer vision, particularly in the application of deep learning techniques.

Excellent problem-solving abilities and a creative approach to tackling complex challenges.

Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively in a team environment.
